title: Aurelion Sol VA in game?
body: Is it just me or does everyone occasionally hear Aurelion Sol talking instead of your normal champs VA line?

replies.body: I know he has an aram announcer pack, maybe thats what is being played?
I've been hearing it too! It's quite interesting{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} , I'm wondering where they are going with that in the lore :)
